experience.description_1: I began my career transition from computer technician to web designer
experience.description_2: I spent a year as a freelance web designer before transitioning into front-end development to merge my design skills with technical expertise
experience.description_3: I'm now a Full-stack developer working as a freelancer. My stack includes React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js. I'm open to full-time opportunities.

experiences.dialog-text-1: I studied hardware for 2 years and then I started working building PC's and doing maintenance
experiences.dialog-text-2: This is where I started to change careers, but I continued working with computers, I studied for 2 years before starting to work as a developer.
experiences.dialog-text-3: Now. I work as a freelancer doing different types of work like complete websites and apps using all the technologies alongside

perfect-shine-payload.title: Perfect Shine Payload
perfect-shine-payload.subtitle: E-commerce platform showcasing cutting-edge web technologies
perfect-shine-payload.description: A modern e-commerce platform built with Next.js and Payload CMS
technologies: Frontend: Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion , Shadcn UI
Backend: Payload CMS, Express, tRPC, MongoDB
Payment: Stripe API for secure transactions

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Hello, my name is Maciel Pinheiro. I'm a 27-year-old Brazilian.
about.lorem: I am a full-stack developer and web designer with 2 years of experience, specializing in building attractive and high-performance interfaces and backend systems. I have advanced knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I work with modern technologies such as React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Node.js, and Express. I also use web design tools like Webflow and Figma. Iâ€™m committed to delivering high-quality results and am ready to bring value to your team.
